tasks.label: Stop daemon (SIGTERM)
tasks.command: kill $(ps -ef | grep '[j]ob_manager.py' | grep -v  ' -- ' | awk 'BEGIN {FS=" "}{ print $2 }' | sort | head -n 1)

tasks.label: Stop daemon (SIGINT)
tasks.command: kill -2 $(ps -ef | grep '[j]ob_manager.py' | grep -v  ' -- ' | awk 'BEGIN {FS=" "}{ print $2 }' | sort | head -n 1)
